Posts.Content: i was disgnosed with BC about a year ago. went thru a drooling 16 weeks of chemo and two major surguries.. now i am finally feeling somewhat better and i need to know does the medicine tamoxifen make your hair fall out of thin it or anything.. i am hearing different stories., the doctor told me no. but should i believe her. losing my hair is the most devastating thing that has ever happened to me.. can someone help me to find out about this,. you can email me at --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed.  Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---- thank you   sandra
Posts.Title: question about a medicine..
